name: Sinister ShadOwl Overlord
lore: Master of ambushes. Feeds on oversight. Will never strike first—but always finishes it.

name: Mystic Pandamonium Blade
lore: Masked guardian of ancient forests. Looks harmless. Fights like myth.

name: Chipper Vortex Squirrel
lore: Chaos runner. Distracts with cuteness, wins with precision flanks.

name: Chopper Storm Squirrel
lore: Twin of the Vortex. Where one confuses, this one disrupts. Relentless symmetry.

name: Majestic Lion Monarch
lore: Leads by calm. Attacks only when the board forgets his reach.

name: Giraffe Psyche Twister
lore: Lateral predator. Sees further than most. Weak on impulse, deadly in pattern.

name: Rabbid Fanged Fury
lore: Uncaged instinct. Loses to calm. But you are not calm, are you?

name: Hippo Vortex Maelstrom
lore: Doesn’t charge. Just collapses through. A gravity of moves.

name: Slothful Psychedelic Dream
lore: Moves once. That’s all it needs. A dream that waits.

name: Turtle Abyssal Enigma
lore: Not slow. Deliberate. What it holds, the grid may never fully see.

name: Crow Oracle Observer
lore: Knows what’s not on the board yet. Disrupts premonitions.

name: Luna Phantom Mirage Lynx
lore: Woven of silence and shimmer. Appears only at the threshold of the turn.

name: Anthropomorphic Hyena
lore: Laughs at your formation. Breaks patterns through chaos and glee.

name: Diabolical Millipede
lore: Too many legs to block. Predict its path, and it will coil around you.
